about_the_game:
This set contains the following three multiplayer missions:
1 "The Mighty Scythe"
2 "Gut Out of Control"
3 "Wings of Mass Destruction"
4 "Twister of Timelines"
5 "The Iron Hunter"
6 "Bathed in Miasma"
7 "As Hot As They Come"
8 "Douse the Flames!"
9 "Burning Shockwaves"
10 "Writhing Watersnakes"
11 "Unrepentant Atrocity"
12 "Too Swift a Conclusion"
13 "All That Glitters"
14 "Transformations Awry"

1, 2, 5, 6, 9, 10 and 13 will be unlocked once you progress as far as Phase 8, while 3, 4, 7, 8, 11, 12 and 14 will be unlocked once you reach Phase 13.

Use the Portal Stone to access the multiplayer lobby and select DLC to receive the additional missions.
If you wish to play with multiple players, then each player must own this additional content in order to proceed.

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
detailed_description:
This set contains the following three multiplayer missions:
1 "The Mighty Scythe"
2 "Gut Out of Control"
3 "Wings of Mass Destruction"
4 "Twister of Timelines"
5 "The Iron Hunter"
6 "Bathed in Miasma"
7 "As Hot As They Come"
8 "Douse the Flames!"
9 "Burning Shockwaves"
10 "Writhing Watersnakes"
11 "Unrepentant Atrocity"
12 "Too Swift a Conclusion"
13 "All That Glitters"
14 "Transformations Awry"

1, 2, 5, 6, 9, 10 and 13 will be unlocked once you progress as far as Phase 8, while 3, 4, 7, 8, 11, 12 and 14 will be unlocked once you reach Phase 13.

Use the Portal Stone to access the multiplayer lobby and select DLC to receive the additional missions.
If you wish to play with multiple players, then each player must own this additional content in order to proceed.

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

name: TOUKIDEN Kiwami - Mission Collection 4-7

subs.option_text: Toukiden: Kiwami - Mission Collection Set - $9.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 2.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over, High Color
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 3.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1980*1080 pixel over, True Color
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

short_description: Toukiden Kiwami - Mission Collection 4, 5, 6 and 7 are included in this bundle. The materials obtained upon clearing the missions can be used to create new weapons and armor.
